Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory755.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nigel', 3: "Even so... I still can't secure victory for him?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Under continuous assault from both his foe and himself, his frame has reached its utmost limit.'}
{3: 'A faint cracking sound resonates from within as the artificial skeleton, designed to facilitate movement, succumbs to the overwhelming strain.'}
{3: 'He falls down, no longer able to climb up.'}
{3: 'Watanabe, similarly wounded, plants his trailblade into the ground to support himself as he recovers his stamina on the other side.'}
{3: 'The heat emanating from him is distorting the surrounding air, the green flame leaving scorch marks on the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What does Ballard really want?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "You've spent more time with him than I have. Can't you tell?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He sneers, the remaining synthetic skin twitching on his face.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Do you harbor unresolved hatred for Babylonia as well?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "Hatred... I don't feel anything like that...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "I was born with congenital blindness, a genetic disease that even Golden Age technology couldn't cure.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "That was why I only realized the people caring for me were not my parents when I finally understood others' conversations.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'I was abandoned... or sold, to be exact, for the price of an old terminal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'Having been abandoned once, why would I care about being discarded again?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He shows no hatred or desire in his lifeless gaze.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Why would you risk your life to fight, then?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe pulls him up from the ground, angrily questioning him.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Why fight me with a broken body using methods you're not skilled in?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What kind of future do you and Ballard want?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "I've never dreamed of such a thing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'You are either born in the glorious Golden Age or born in Eden.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'You know what a happy future looks like, and you have felt its shape...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "But not me... I was born in the greatest era, but I've always lived in the darkest corners.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'When Ballard took me out of that secret laboratory, the Post-Pandemic world outside looked no different than the one inside.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He points to his eyes with his still-intact left hand.'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "I've never seen the light, so how could I dream of it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'So Ballard gave me something everyone is born with—something that will stay with me for the rest of my life...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'Power. The power to fight.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'Fighting is the only redemption I can find.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "It's my only purpose, the one thing that no one can take away.", 4: '2'}
{3: "He grabs Watanabe's hand, trying to hold on to it tightly."}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'You fight for survival, salvation, the dream of a future...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'I fight for the fight itself.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'So, no matter the mission, I will do it... No matter the enemy, I will eliminate them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory732.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nigel', 3: 'Leave it to me, Generalissimo.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "...Your treatment isn't over yet.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ballard does not dissuade his stubborn subordinate directly. He knows that depriving him of battle is worse than taking his life.'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "Just a minor injury from my last mistake. I won't fail this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'This is no minor injury, especially to the magnetic device on your right arm. Can you still control it properly?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "I'll handle it myself if the situation is as reported.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Watanabe... was one of my best students. You can't defeat him in your current state.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nigel has always been a quiet person, and he has been even quieter since his last failure.'}
{3: "But this time, he uncharacteristically opposes Ballard's suggestion."}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "You can't go, Generalissimo.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'The Forsaken only has the confidence to challenge Babylonia with you leading them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "You've been preparing for this one opportunity for decades.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'The time has come, and the fuse is lit—you either pull the trigger now or give up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'Neither Babylonia nor Forsaken will give us time to hesitate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'You always tell me that power must be used wisely.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "I don't think there's a more fitting moment to use my power than now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ballard looks at Nigel, his tone solemn.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'You will die.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'This is not about how deadly Watanabe is. Ballard understands that the man before him will do whatever it takes to complete this mission after his previous failure.'}
{3: 'And the moment has come as Nigel said.'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: "I'm not one to actively seek death, but...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nigel', 3: 'Giving my life in this battle will be my greatest redemption.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Time seems to stretch infinitely in silence.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "I'll wait for your good news...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ballard stares in the direction Nigel left for a long time after he vanished into the shadow.'}
{3: 'Finally, he picks up an old terminal and dials the only contact on it.'}
{3: 'The ringing echoes in the empty office.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory755.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nigel', 3: "He's still waiting for my good news...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: "The magnetic ring on Nigel's right arm begins to glow red."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Zong immediately rushes toward the stunned Jada, while Watanabe, having tossed Nigel away, quickly moves to your side.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nigel', 3: "You will not stop Generalissimo's plan, no matter what!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'Smoke and flame from the explosion obscures your vision in an instant.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'The smell of burning gunpowder brings Nigel back to the day he first met Ballard.'}
{3: 'The sound of explosions, shattering cages, heavy footsteps... and an invitation he had never heard before.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Another victim... Would you like to join us and burn those insects to ash?'}
